game.name: Backrooms Santa
game.shortDescription: Backrooms Santa is a singleplayer horror game. Bring back the kids gifts and escape a massive Backrooms maze — while holiday horrors hunt you every step of the way. How fast can you save the kids christmas?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Backrooms Santa is a singleplayer horror game. Bring back the kids gifts and escape a massive Backrooms maze — while holiday horrors hunt you every step of the way. How fast can you save the kids christmas?

reviewHighlights.text: As someone who has never played a Backrooms game before, this was my very first experience with the genre. I usually play RPGs, so I can only judge th...
Game is very challenging but isn't crazy long so it balances out. Highly recommend.
